name: PlayThisGuy.com
tag_list: sports, fantasy-sports, fantasy-football, fantasy, nfl, football
overview:
PlayThisGuy! provides smart and simple fantasy football advice.

Everyone wants to win at fantasy football. The challenge is that you want the best information the Web has to offer but no idea how to find it (or who provides it).

You can continue to listen to the same sources you always have like ESPN or Yahoo! but wouldn’t you like to know for sure which Web sites provide the best advice?

PlayThisGuy! aggregates and analyzes fantasy football advice from more than 50 Web sites so you will have a “wisdom of the crowds” approach to advice rather than listening to a single source that may or may not be good.

The first-of-its-kind information is unique because it can tell you which Web sites actually provide the best historical advice.

external_links.title: For Fantasy, A Dose of Wall Street
